alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Miller, southwestern Dougherty, southeastern Clay, Mitchell, Baker, southern Calhoun and northeastern Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 345 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Blakely to near Arlington to 12 miles east of Colquitt. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Pelham, Camilla, Arlington, Baconton, Leary, Douglasville, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Flint, Parksville, Cotton, Holt, Mimsville, Branchville, Greenough, Bellview, Rowena, Milford and Hopeful. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell
